instructions:
Combine Crispix, pretzels and nuts in an 8 x 8 inch baking pan. Stir seasonings into melted margarine
and drizzle 1 tsp at a time over Snax Mix then gently stir to coat. Continue drizzling 1 tsp at a time and
stirring until margarine is used up. Bake in oven at 250 F for 45 minutes. Stir every 15 minutes. Spread on
paper towels to cool and store in an air tight container. 
*(Rev. 10/31/97)*.
ingredients: 1 tsp lemon juice (or 1 tsp Real Lemon)
name: Snax Mix
